# COVID-19 visualizations

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
```

```{r ,cache=TRUE, message=FALSE}
# Exam situations in USA
covid_us<- covid19("USA", level = 2)
```
```{r}
#head(covid_us)
ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date, y = confirmed)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~id)
```
